short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur, not block! Let's make the Internet less distractive so that we can focus on what matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur, not Block! Let's make the Internet less interesting by blurring images on your favorite social media website such as YouTube and let you defer content consumption for later. So that  we can focus on what matters most.
